text: The New World is a 2005 historical romance drama movie written and directed by Terrence Malick. It is about the founding of the Jamestown, Virginia and the historical figures Captain John Smith, Pocahontas of the Powhatan tribe, and Englishman John Rolfe. It stars Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christopher Plummer, Christian Bale, August Schellenberg, Wes Studi, David Thewlis and Yorick van Wageningen. ==References== Category:2000s historical movies Category:2005 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Virginia Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Fiction set in the past Category:Movies about Native Americans Category:Movies about interracial romance Category:Movies composed by James Horner
title: The New World (2005 movie)
